name: GUESS Graph Data Format File
summary: Learn about .GDF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GDF files are saved in a plain text format and contain a series of lines that specify the nodes and edges of the graph.

description: File used by GUESS (Graph Exploration System), a visualization tool used for displaying networks and mathematical graphs; stores node and edge data that comprises the graph and subgraphs; used for exploratory visualization in research and academic environments.
